sourcesContent:
<mat-accordion>
    <mat-expansion-panel (opened)="panelOpenState = true"
                         (closed)="panelOpenState = false">
        <mat-expansion-panel-header>
            <mat-panel-title>
                real estate
            </mat-panel-title>
        </mat-expansion-panel-header>

        <mat-card class="example-card">
            <mat-card-content>
                <iframe width="100%" height="500" frameBorder="10" [src]="urlSafe"></iframe>
            </mat-card-content>
        </mat-card>

    </mat-expansion-panel>
</mat-accordion>
